Description.Text: Mainport offers a world of luxury at a unique waterfront location in the city centre. Each room offers spa facilities, butler service and free internet. Free access to Spa and hammam. Mainport is the gateway to all continents in the world, integrating the influences of the world throughout the hotel with Rotterdam as it's "home port" in a 5 star design setting. Located on the banks of the river Maas with sweeping views over the water and the skyline of Rotterdam, often referred to as "Manhattan on the Maas". Mainport inspires by setting the trend; indulge in a luxury lifestyle of cocktails on quay level at cocktailbar 'On The Rocks' or a stylish dinner at restaurant 'Down Under'. Butler service, valet parking and free WiFi throughout in a setting of exceptional design. Mainport relaxes by offering world's best wellness facilities in the rooms, such as private Finnish sauna and Jacuzzi overlooking the water. Regardless of which room ,hotel guests have free access to Spa Heaven on the 8th floor. Spa Heaven ensures pure relaxation in its Finnish panorama sauna, the showers with scrubs, the sultry Turkish steam room and rejuvenating hammam complex, where pores are unblocked and muscles slowly massaged on warm marble tables. Spa Heaven also offers a spa menu for facials, a relaxing massage or special body treatments. The Life Fitness gym with the latest State-of-the-Art equipment is right beside. Mainport is just steps away from anything and everything in the city centre of Rotterdam. Mainport is not just a hotel: it's a lifestyle!

Mainport offers a world of luxury at a unique waterfront location in the city centre. Located on the banks of the river Maas with sweeping views over the water and the skyline of Rotterdam, often referred to as "Manhattan on the Maas".

City XL - The city XL (32m2) is designed for today's city traveller. Business or leisure, the supersized room with funky layout, XL King size bed and massive bathroom offer all the space one might need. The walk-in shower, whirlpool and mirror TV help you relax after a hard day's work or exploring the city.
Corner XL - The corner XL is all about the city experience. With windows on two sides there is no way you can escape the Rotterdam feeling! The large bathroom includes walk-in shower, whirlpool and mirror TV.
Waterfront Sauna - The best of two worlds; quietly overlooking the oldest inner harbor of Rotterdam, yet right in the heart of the vibrant city! To escape from the breathtaking view, this room (32m2) offers a spectacular bathroom with walk-in shower, whirlpool, mirror TV and private sauna.
Waterfront Spa - Explore Rotterdam from the Jacuzzi! Waterfront Spa (42m2), the true jet set room, offers a huge Jacuzzi in front of the window overlooking the oldest inner harbor. This true spa experience includes a bathroom with walk-in shower and private sauna.
